name: RK-0
description: The RK-0 front grip can be installed on any handguard with a lower Picatinny rail or on the B-9 rail. It provides a convenient way to hold weapons while firing.

name: RK-1
description: The RK-1 front grip is designed to be mounted on any handguard with a lower Picatinny rail or on the B-9 rail and is used to provide a more comfortable grip for the gun when firing.

name: RK-2
description: The RK-2 front grip can be installed on any handguard with a lower Picatinny rail or on a B-9 rail. It provides a convenient way to hold weapons while firing.

name: RK-4
description: The RK-4 front grip can be installed on any handguard with a lower Picatinny rail or on the B-9 rail. It provides a convenient way to hold weapons while firing.

name: RK-5
description: The RK-5 front grip is designed to be installed on handguards with a lower Picatinny rail, or on the B-9 and B-9M rails, and is used to provide a comfortable grip on the weapon when firing.

name: RK-6
description: The RK-6 hand stopper is designed to be installed on any handguard with a lower Picatinny rail or on the B-9 rail and is used to provide a more comfortable grip on the weapon when firing.

name: M-LOK AFG
description: The Magpul M-LOK AFG (Angled Fore Grip) is a refinement of the original AFG and AFG-2. While weighing only 1.2 ounces (34 g), including hardware, the Magpul M-LOK AFG is a surprisingly high-strength grip.

name: AFG-2
description: The Magpul AFG-2 is a highly ergonomic, angled foregrip designed to enhance weapon control and handling. It features a compact and low-profile design, allowing for a comfortable grip and natural hand placement on the firearm.

name: RVG
description: The Magpul RVG (Rail Vertical Grip) is a lightweight and versatile vertical foregrip designed for increased weapon control. It attaches securely to any Picatinny rail system, providing a stable and ergonomic gripping surface. Designed for use with 1913 Picatinny railed hand guards, the RVG is a basic, lightweight, cost-effective vertical fore grip. The shape is ergonomically designed for use as a traditional vertical grip. It has also been optimized for use with the "thumb break method" of shooting.

name: Pro M-LOK Handstop
description: The UTG Pro M-LOK Handstop is a compact accessory designed for M-LOK-compatible handguards. It serves as a hand stop to prevent the shooter's hand from sliding too far forward on the firearm.

name: UltraSlim Angeled Foregrip
description: The UTG lightweight front tactical grip for M-lok forends is made from aircraft-grade aluminum, making it both durable and easy to handle.  Its textured surface provides a secure grip in challenging conditions or when wearing gloves, improving weapon control.

name: Ultra Slim M-LOK MT-FGM01X Foregrip
description: The UTG Ultra Slim M-LOK MT-FGM01X Foregrip is a lightweight and sleek foregrip that is designed for M-LOK-compatible handguards. Its slim profile enhances maneuverability and provides a streamlined appearance.

name: SHIFT Vertical Foregrip
description: The SHIFT Vertical Foregrip is a versatile accessory that is compatible with Picatinny rail systems and is designed to enhance gun control and stability. Its ergonomic design and textured surface provide a comfortable and secure grip, allowing for improved handling during firearm operation.

name: DD Vertical Foregrip
description: Crafted by Daniel Defense, this vertical foregrip is a reliable and durable accessory that optimizes weapon control and handling. It ensures exceptional quality and compatibility with Picatinny rail systems.

name: AFG-2 (FDE)
description: The Magpul AFG-2 is a highly ergonomic, angled foregrip designed to enhance weapon control and handling. It features a compact and low-profile design, allowing for a comfortable grip and natural hand placement on the firearm.

It attaches securely to any Picatinny rail system, providing a stable and ergonomic gripping surface. Designed for use with 1913 Picatinny railed hand guards, the RVG is a basic, lightweight, cost-effective vertical fore grip. The shape is ergonomically designed for use as a traditional vertical grip. It has also been optimized for use with the "thumb break method" of shooting.

name: DD Vertical Foregrip (MILSPEC)
description: Crafted by Daniel Defense, this vertical foregrip is a reliable and durable accessory that optimizes weapon control and handling. It ensures exceptional quality and compatibility with Picatinny rail systems.
